attributes.action: Tony Blair should be declared unfit to hold any public office ever.
attributes.additional_details: After the Chilcot enquiry, it’s quite clear, Tony Blair was responsible for leading the UK to an unnecessary war in Iraq. Soldiers died in vain because the Army officers along with ministers could not plan properly. Tony Blair should be declared unsuitable for holding any public office ever again and should be stripped of his honours. This would make the families pain a little bit more bearable who lost their loved ones, if not justify.
attributes.background: Tony Blair was responsible for leading the UK to an unnecessary war in Iraq. This war could have been avoided and so is the death of thousands of civilians and hundreds of soldiers.
